00048 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 
00050 /* For ht32_usbd_descriptor.c                                                                               */
00051 #define COMMUNICATION_INF_CLASS           (0x0E)
00052 #define COMMUNICATION_INF_SUBCLASS        (0x01)
00053 #define COMMUNICATION_INF_PTCO            (0x00)
00054 
00055 #define DATA_INF_CLASS                    DESC_CLASS_0A_CDC_DATA
00056 #define DATA_INF_SUBCLASS                 CDC_SUBCLASS_NULL
00057 #define DATA_INF_PTCO                     CDC_PROTOCOL_NULL
00058 
00059 #define IAD_LEN_INF                       (0x08)
00060 #define UVC_LEN_INF                       (0x0D)
00061 #define IT_LEN                            (0x12)
00062 #define OT_UNIT_LEN                       (0x09)
00063 #define PU_LEN                            (0x0B)
00064 #define UVC_LEN_EPT                       (0x05)
00065 #define VS_HEADER_LEN                     (0x0E)
00066 #define VS_FORMAT_LEN                     (0x1B)
00067 #define VS_FRAME_LEN                      (0x1E)
00068 #define VS_STILL_ILEN                     (0x0A)
00069 #define VS_COLOR_FORMAT_LEN               (0x06)
00070 
00071 #define VC_TotalLength                    (u16)(UVC_LEN_INF + IT_LEN + OT_UNIT_LEN + PU_LEN)
00072 #define VS_TotalLength                    (u16)(VS_HEADER_LEN + VS_FORMAT_LEN + VS_FRAME_LEN + VS_STILL_ILEN \
00073                                             + VS_COLOR_FORMAT_LEN)
00074 
00075 /* Video related definition                                                                                 */
00076 #define CONTROL_ID  (0x00)
00077 /*#define CT_ID       (0x01)
00078 #define IT_ID       (0x02)
00079 #define OT_ID       (0x03)
00080 #define SU_ID       (0x04)
00081 #define PU_ID       (0x05)*/
00082 #define IT_ID       (0x01)
00083 #define OT_ID       (0x05)
00084 #define PU_ID       (0x03)
00085 
00086 #define VC_INTERFACE_NUM  (0x00)
00087 #define VS_INTERFACE_NUM  (0x01)
00088 
00089 /* Video interface class code                                                                               */
00090 #define CC_VIDEO    (0x0E)
00091 
00092 /* Video interface subclass codes                                                                           */
00093 #define SC_UNDEFINED                  (0x00)
00094 #define SC_VIDEOCONTROL               (0x01)
00095 #define SC_VIDEOSTREAMING             (0x02)
00096 #define SC_VIDEO_INTERFACE_COLLECTION (0x03)
00097 
00098 /* Video interface protocol codes                                                                           */
00099 #define PC_PROTOCOL_UNDEFINED         (0x00)
00100 
00101 /* Video class-specific descriptor types                                                                    */
00102 #define CS_UNDEFINED        (0x20)
00103 #define CS_DEVICE           (0x21)
00104 #define CS_CONFIGURATION    (0x22)
00105 #define CS_SRTING           (0x23)
00106 #define CS_INTERFACE        (0x24)
00107 #define CS_ENDPOINT         (0x25)
00108 
00109 /* Video Class-specific Request Codes                                                                       */
00110 #define CLASS_REQ_00_RC_UNDEFINED   (0x00)
00111 #define CLASS_REQ_01_SET_CUR        (0x01)
00112 #define CLASS_REQ_81_GET_CUR        (0x81)
00113 #define CLASS_REQ_82_GET_MIN        (0x82)
00114 #define CLASS_REQ_83_GET_MAX        (0x83)
00115 #define CLASS_REQ_84_GET_RES        (0x84)
00116 #define CLASS_REQ_85_GET_LEN        (0x85)
00117 #define CLASS_REQ_86_GET_INFO       (0x86)
00118 #define CLASS_REQ_87_GET_DEF        (0x87)
00119 
00120 /* VideoControl Interface Control Selectors                                                                 */
00121 #define VC_CONTROL_UNDEFINED          (0x00)
00122 #define VC_VIDEO_POWER_MODE_CONTROL   (0x01)
00123 #define VC_REQUEST_ERROR_CODE_CONTROL (0x02)
00124 #define Reserved                      (0x03)
00125 
00126 /* Selector Unit Control Selectors                                                                          */
00127 #define SU_CONTROL_UNDEFINED          (0x00)
00128 #define SU_INPUT_SELECT_CONTROL       (0x01)
00129 
00130 /* Processing Unit Control Selectors                                                                        */
00131 #define PU_CONTROL_UNDEFINED          (0x00)
00132 #define PU_BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL         (0x02)
00133 
00134 /*                                                                                                          */
00135 #define VS_CONTROL_UNDEFINED          (0x00)
00136 #define VS_PROBE_CONTROL              (0x01)
00137 #define VS_COMMIT_CONTROL             (0x02)
00138 
00139 /* Request Error Code Control                                                                               */
00140 #define NO_ERROR          (0x00)
00141 #define NOT_READY         (0x01)
00142 #define WRONG_STATE       (0x02)
00143 #define POWER             (0x03)
00144 #define OUT_OF_RANGE      (0x04)
00145 #define INVALID_UNIT      (0x05)
00146 #define INVALID_CONTROL   (0x06)
00147 #define INVALID_REQUEST   (0x07)
00148 #define UNKNOWN           (0xFF)
00149 
00150 #define SUPPORTS_GET          (0x01)
00151 #define SUPPORTS_SET          (0x02)
00152 #define STATE_DISABLED        (0x04)
00153 #define AUTOUPDATE_CONTROL    (0x08)
00154 #define ASYNCHRONOUS_CONTROL  (0x10)
00155 
00156 
00157 #define DESC_IMAGE_WIDTH        320
00158 #define DESC_IMAGE_HEIGHT       240
00159 #define FRAME_FPS               (((_EP4LEN-12) * 1000) / (DESC_IMAGE_WIDTH * DESC_IMAGE_HEIGHT * 2))//488000
00160 
00161 #define DESC_IMAGE_MINBITRATE   DESC_IMAGE_WIDTH * DESC_IMAGE_HEIGHT * 2
00162 #define DESC_IMAGE_MAXBITRATE   DESC_IMAGE_WIDTH * DESC_IMAGE_HEIGHT * 2 * 30
00163 #define DESC_FRAME_BUF_SIZE     DESC_IMAGE_WIDTH * DESC_IMAGE_HEIGHT * 2
00164 
00165 #define DESC_FRAME_INTERVAL     (10000000 / FRAME_FPS)
00166 
00167 #define DESC_CLOCK_FREQUENCY    15000000UL
00168 
00169 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00170 typedef __PACKED_H struct __UVC_VIDEO_PROBE_ANDCOMMIT_CONTROL {
00171   u16 bmHint;                             // bitfield indicating what fields shall be kept fixed
00172   u8  bFormatIndex;                       // Video format index from a format descriptor
00173   u8  bFrameIndex;                        // Video frame index from a frame descriptor
00174   u32 dwFrameInterval;                    // Frame interval in 100 ns units
00175   u16 wKeyFrameRate;                      // Key frame rate in key-frame per video-frame units
00176   u16 wPFrameRate;                        // PFrame rate i PFrame/key frame units
00177   u16 wCompQuality;                       // Compression quality control in abstract units (0..10000)
00178   u16 wCompWindowSize;                    // Window size for average bit rate control
00179   u16 wDelay;                             // int. VS interface latency in ms from capture to presentation
00180   u32 dwMaxVideoFrameSize;                // maximum video frame or codec specific segment size in bytes
00181   u32 dwMaxPayloadTransferSize;           // max. bytes the device can transmit/receive in single payload transfer
00182 #if (UVC_VERSION == 0x0110)
00183   u32 dwClockFrequency;                   // device clock frequency in Hz for specified format
00184   u8  bmFraminInfo;                       // bitfield control
00185   u8  bPreferedVersion;                   // preferred payload format version for specified bFormatIndex
00186   u8  bMinVersion;                        // minimum payload format version for specified bFormatIndex
00187   u8  bMaxVersion;                        // maximum payload format version for specified bFormatIndex
00188 #endif
00189 } __PACKED_F UVC_VIDEO_PROBE_AND_COMMIT_CONTROL;
00190 
00191 
00192 typedef struct _UVC_REQUEST
00193 {
00194   u8  bSet_CUR;
00195   u8  bGet_CUR;
00196   u16  bGet_MIN;
00197   u16  bGet_MAX;
00198   u8  bGet_RES;
00199   u8  bGet_LEN;
00200   u8  bGet_INFO;
00201   u16   bGet_DEF;
00202 }UVC_Request;
00203 
00204 typedef struct _UVC_CONTROL
00205 {
00206   UVC_Request SELECTOR_CONTROL;
00207   UVC_Request BRIGHTNESS_CONTROL;
00208   UVC_Request POWER_MODE_CONTROL;
00209   UVC_Request REQUEST_ERROR_CODE_CONTROL;
00210   UVC_Request VIDEO_PROBE_CONTROL;
00211   UVC_Request VIDEO_COMMIT_CONTROL;
00212 }USBDClass_UVC_Control;
